snippet.title: 1.0 is Out Now!
snippet.description:
The Fun Pimps are pleased to announce the 1.0 release of “7 Days to Die” is out on Steam, PS5, Xbox Series X/S and Windows platforms. Buy it Now!

For more info on purchasing, discounts and region availability read on:

https://7daystodie.com/1-0-is-out/
